attributes.action: For Gordon Brown to be democratic and call a general election for 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown is unelected so the country should decide whether he is right for the country or not. 2009 is not ideal but is better than 2010!

It is not a democracy unless your elected!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
